name: Food Fighter (Kotaro Fujita)
description:
NOTE: This is a for the 2019 Philly Game Mechanics: "TRY GAME JAM". 

IMPORTANT NOTE: This is a game jam game and not particularly working well. Its only meant as a chronicle of the work done for the game jam.

This a prototype of a 3D version of the traditional beat-em-up games like Final Fight and Streets of Rage. 

Team members:

Brian Baldwin

Sutton Ashby

Alex Cole

Phil Simmons

Kotaro Fujita

Day Johnson

Nathan Gapnoff
